## AudioLiveStream interface

Audio with an indefinite length that cannot be paused.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AudioLiveStream extends Audio 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Audio

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [length](./stentor-models.audiolivestream.length.md) | -1 | Length for livestreams is always negative one since it has no length. |
